name: Jabr Kushan
story: Farid Kakar grew up in a small village in Afghanistan. His father was a farmer and his mother was a homemaker. As a child, he showed great interest in the military and would often make toy guns out of sticks and rocks. At the age of 18, he joined the Afghan army and quickly rose through the ranks. He was eventually recruited by the OPFOR and has been serving as a sharpshooter ever since.
